titleStmt.title: An ordinance for the speedy raising of moneys for His Majesties service
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lords Justices and Council.
England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II).

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by William Bladen by special order,

notesStmt.note: "March the I. 1660: Ordered, that this ordinance be forthwith printed and published --Mat. Barry Clerk of the General Convention of Ireland."
Reproduction of original in: Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
